Session.longDescription: OEM Extension for Session to provide the Client details.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ClientID.description: The Id of the client creating this session.
ClientID.longDescription: This will be the unique identifier set by the client.
